name: AI Interpretation Length A/B Test
hypothesis: Users prefer more detailed AI interpretations over concise ones, leading to higher engagement and session duration
description: Testing two variants of AI interpretation length to optimize user experience. This experiment will help us understand if detailed interpretations provide more value to users or if they prefer shorter, more digestible content.

variants.name: Current (Concise)
variants.description: Existing concise interpretation format with 2-3 sentences per aspect

variants.name: Detailed Interpretations
variants.description: Longer, more detailed interpretations with examples and actionable advice
